description: This endpoint allows you to charge multiple payment tokens at once.

spec.title: Narration for the bulk charges
spec.retry_strategy: This specifies what should happen when the transaction fails. It is an object containing 3 properties (retry_interval, retry_amount_variable, retry_attempt_variable)
spec.retry_interval: This is the number of mins it should take for the retry to happen
spec.retry_amount_variable: This is the amount that would be retried after the specified number of attempts in percentage
spec.retry_attempt_variable: This is the number of times the retry should happen
spec.bulk_data: An array of objects containing the tokenized charge data
